titleStmt.title: For the King and Parliament and his councel and teachers and to every individual person, superiour and inferiour, throughout the English nation that have a hand against the innocent people of God called Quakers, one visitation and warning more from the Lord unto you.
titleStmt.author: Bayly, William, d. 1675.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
